record.fda_outcome_note: CRL issued 40 days BEFORE scheduled PDUFA (2026-03-25). Early CRL.
record.fda_outcome_description: Complete Response Letter — FDA concluded AURORA and BEACON trials did not sufficiently demonstrate association between PPIX reduction (surrogate biomarker) and sunlight exposure-based clinical endpoints, despite acknowledging strong mechanistic plausibility.
record.fda_key_issue: Surrogate endpoint insufficiency — exactly matching ODIN surrogate_only signal

trade.exit_rationale: ODIN SMALL_POSITION_EARLY_EXIT — exited 7 days before CRL

record.classification_rationale: ODIN Tier 3 (65.9%) with SMALL_POSITION_EARLY_EXIT. Actual trade: +4.15% captured during runup, exited Feb 6. CRL hit Feb 13 (-22%). Net swing +26.1% vs buy-and-hold. ODIN surrogate_only signal directly predicted FDA rationale.

surrogate_only.description: ODIN flagged PPIX as surrogate-only endpoint. FDA CRL stated trials did not sufficiently show association between PPIX reduction and clinical endpoints. Word-for-word match to signal thesis.

inexperienced_sponsor.description: Disc Medicine first NDA submission. Company acknowledged CRL delays potential approval, plans Type A meeting — consistent with inexperienced navigation.

ta_high_risk.description: Hematology HIGH_RISK classification validated. FDA applied elevated scrutiny to endpoint package.

novice_high_risk_ta.description: Interaction: inexperienced sponsor in high-risk TA. Compounding risk realized — company unable to anticipate FDA surrogate endpoint concerns pre-submission.

integrity.chain: This record supersedes and chains from prior_record_hash. Both git commits form an immutable audit trail.
integrity.verification: To verify: JSON.stringify(record, null, 2) → SHA-256 must equal hash field.
